title: AI tool detects structural heart disease in adults using a smartwatch
description: An artificial intelligence (AI) algorithm paired with the single-lead electrocardiogram (ECG) sensors on a smartwatch accurately diagnosed structural heart diseases, such as weakened pumping ability, damaged valves or thickened heart muscle, according to a preliminary study to be presented at the American Heart Association's Scientific Sessions 2025.

title: Staffordshire author launches chilling AI thriller
description: Artificial intelligence (AI), embodied in eerily calm humanoid robots, halts global warming and stabilises civilisation. But what begins as salvation for humanity soon turns sour.

title: Names of 5 million of 6 million Jews killed in Holocaust now identified
description: JERUSALEM — Five million of the more than 6 million Jews killed in the Holocaust have now been identified, and with the further help of artificial intelligence, even more names could be recovered, Israeli researchers said Monday. title: State’s AI task force recommends ways to navigate the technology’s evolving role in Maine
description: The Task Force on Artificial Intelligence's final report includes over 30 strategies to ensure Mainers are fluent in the technology and are vigilant in its misuse.
content:
The state’s Artificial Intelligence Task Force released its final report on the emerging technology and its implications for Mainers on Friday.

title: Maxfort School Launches Future-Ready Framework to Revolutionize Education
description: Maxfort School in New Delhi has unveiled a Future-Ready Learning Framework to equip students with skills essential for thriving in a technology-driven world. This initiative emphasizes artificial intelligence, creativity, and sustainability while fostering empathy and collaboration. It aims to blend academic rigor with real-world application, ensuring holistic student development.
content: Maxfort School in Rohini, New Delhi, has announced a groundbreaking educational initiative with the unveiling of its Future-Ready Learning Framework. The program is meticulously crafted to prepare students for a rapidly evolving technological and soc... [1546 chars]

title: Ready Learning Framework integrating AI, Sustainability, and Experiential Education
description: New Delhi [India], November 3: Maxfort School (Rohini, New Delhi) has announced the implementation of its new Future-Ready Learning Framework designed to prepare students for the rapidly changing technological and social landscape. The initiative focuses on equipping learners with essential skills in artificial intelligence, sustainability, creativity, and experiential learning while promoting values of empathy, responsibility, and collaboration. At its core, the initiative reflects Maxfort's belief that education must nurture not only sharp minds but kind hearts -- preparing students to innovate with purpose and lead with empathy in an increasingly intelligent world.
